title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for calculating the amount of heat needed to raise the temperature to 933 K.

To raise the temperature from 298 K to 933 K:

q=24 Jmol K×1.00 mol×635 K = 15,000 J = 15 kJMathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamyCaiabg2 da9maalaaabaGaaeOmaiaabsdacaqGGaGaaeOsaaqaaiaab2gacaqG VbGaaeiBaiaabccacaqGlbaaaiabgEna0kaaigdacaGGUaGaaGimai aaicdacaqGGaGaaeyBaiaab+gacaqGSbGaey41aqRaaGOnaiaaioda caaI1aGaaeiiaiaabUeacaqGGaGaaeypaiaabccacaqGXaGaaeynai aabYcacaqGWaGaaeimaiaabcdacaqGGaGaaeOsaiaabccacaqG9aGa aeiiaiaabgdacaqG1aGaaeiiaiaabUgacaqGkbaaaa@5ACA@

1 point is earned for adding the heat of fusion to the previous result to get a final answer.

It takes 10.7 kJ to melt the Al at 933 K.

15 kJ + 10.7 kJ = 26 kJ

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for a calculation to get equal numbers of moles for comparison.

For extracting Al from ore:

1675 kJ/molrxn×1 mol of reaction2 mol Al=837.5 kJ per mol of AlMathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaGymaiaaiA dacaaI3aGaaGynaiaabccacaqGRbGaaeOsaiaab+cacaqGTbGaae4B aiaabYgadaWgaaWcbaGaamOCaiaadIhacaWGUbaabeaakiabgEna0o aalaaabaGaaeymaiaabccacaqGTbGaae4BaiaabYgacaqGGaGaae4B aiaabAgacaqGGaGaaeOCaiaabwgacaqGHbGaae4yaiaabshacaqGPb Gaae4Baiaab6gaaeaacaqGYaGaaeiiaiaab2gacaqGVbGaaeiBaiaa bccacaqGbbGaaeiBaaaacqGH9aqpcaaI4aGaaG4maiaaiEdacaGGUa GaaGynaiaabccacaqGRbGaaeOsaiaabccacaqGWbGaaeyzaiaabkha caqGGaGaaeyBaiaab+gacaqGSbGaaeiiaiaab+gacaqGMbGaaeiiai aabgeacaqGSbaaaa@6C1B@

Producing 1.00 mol of Al from Al2O3 requires 837.5 kJ.

1 point is earned for a correct comparison.

Because 26 kJ < 837.5 kJ, recycling requires less energy.
